mapper.select: SELECT PB.*,W.*,SU.USERNAME AS WNAME FROM PROJECTBOARD PB JOIN WRITING W ON PB.BOARDNO=W.BOARDNO JOIN STOOLUSER SU ON W.WRITINGID=SU.USERID WHERE W.WRITINGID=#{id}

SELECT PB.*,T.*,SU.USERNAME AS TNAME, S.USERNAME AS TMNAME FROM PROJECTBOARD PB JOIN TASK T ON PB.BOARDNO=T.BOARDNO JOIN TASKMANAGER TM ON T.TASKNO=TM.TASKNO JOIN STOOLUSER SU ON T.TASKID=SU.USERID JOIN STOOLUSER S ON TM.TASKMANAGERID=S.USERID WHERE T.TASKID=#{id}
SELECT PB.*,S.*,SU.USERNAME AS SNAME FROM PROJECTBOARD PB JOIN SCHEDULE S ON PB.BOARDNO=S.BOARDNO JOIN STOOLUSER SU ON S.SCHEDULEID=SU.USERID WHERE S.SCHEDULEID=#{id}
